attributes.action: Sack the BBC Trust for failing to act in the best interest of the licence fee payer.
attributes.additional_details:
THE BBC Trust has failed. Meant to replace the bias BBC Board of Governors and act in the best interest of the licence fee payers.
 It has itself failed to be politically unbiased and not act the best interest of the licence fee payers.
FOR Example, BBC Parliament, Although I have nothing againts showing live and special programs such as PMQ or Deputy PMQ but repeats of repeats of parliamentry debates is a waste of money. Also is anyone outside London interested in London Mayors
QT which it transmits. IT seems to be creating jobs for itself rather then finding ways to cut money.
